column4: hey guys, apt-get remove nginx is not removing nginx.... is there a way to force an uninstall?
says it cant stop it ... so I killed the processes ... tried again, same thing . and the processes were back
dont see it there eihter ... I killed the processes as well manually kill
yeah... until I try doing a remove
now its back... just tried doing apt-get remove again
kill the processes, then clear out the /var/run/nginx* files
I would say the uninstall script is starting it...
